item.title: Adyen predicts that smartphones will soon surpass tablets as the primary device for mobile payments
item.description:
Source: Adyen. Click on the image to view a larger version. Adyen, a global payments technology provider, recently released its quarterly Mobile Payments Index for Q3. This report analyzes mobile payment data from web-based transactions across Adyen’s customer base between July and September. Notably, the Index reveals that nearly half of online transactions using specific payment methods are now conducted on mobile devices. The Index shows that 47% of payments made with JCB, a Japanese card, were completed on mobile devices...
